channel.title: Fletching Interface?

item.title: Fletching Interface?
item.dc:creator: @mathew000000000 mathew000000000
item.description:
@mathew000000000 wrote:

i was woundering what i have to do to this to make the fletching interface pop up with if you click the short bow it will fletch a short bow and same with long bow and the arrow shafts

else if(itemUsed == 946 && useWith == 1511) { if(playerLevel[9] >= 1) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); addItem(48, 1); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[9]), 9); } else { sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 1 to make this bow."); } }
how do i add the interface to pop up and also have all 3 selections, or atleast 2 anybody know?
